verses.text: Upon \w the|strong="H3588"\w* rivers \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Babylon, \w there|strong="H5769"\w* \w we|strong="H3588"\w* sat \w and|strong="H3068"\w* wept: \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w we|strong="H3588"\w* remembered Sion:
\w On|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* willows \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* midst thereof \w we|strong="H3588"\w* hung up \w our|strong="H0430"\w* instruments.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w there|strong="H5769"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* led \w us|strong="H3588"\w* into captivity required \w of|strong="H0113"\w* \w us|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* words \w of|strong="H0113"\w* songs. \w And|strong="H5769"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* carried \w us|strong="H3588"\w* away, said: Sing ye \w to|strong="H5769"\w* \w us|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* hymn \w of|strong="H0113"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* songs \w of|strong="H0113"\w* Sion.

\w How|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H0905"\w* \w we|strong="H3588"\w* sing \w the|strong="H3588"\w* song \w of|strong="H0905"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="H2617"\w* \w in|strong="H1419"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* strange land?
\w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* forget thee, O Jerusalem, let \w my|strong="H3588"\w* right hand \w be|strong="H8064"\w* forgotten.

Let \w my|strong="H5921"\w* tongue cleave \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* jaws, \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* do \w not|strong="H3588"\w* remember thee: \w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w make|strong="H3588"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* Jerusalem \w the|strong="H5921"\w* beginning \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w joy|strong="H5921"\w*.

Remember, O \w Lord|strong="H2617"\w*, \w the|strong="H3588"\w* children \w of|strong="H0216"\w* Edom, \w in|strong="H1419"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* day \w of|strong="H0216"\w* Jerusalem: \w Who|strong="H3588"\w* say: Rase \w it|strong="H3588"\w*, rase \w it|strong="H3588"\w*, \w even|strong="H3588"\w* \w to|strong="H5769"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* foundation thereof.

O daughter \w of|strong="H3117"\w* Babylon, miserable: blessed \w shall|strong="H3117"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w be|strong="H3117"\w* \w who|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3117"\w* repay thee thy payment which thou hast paid \w us|strong="H3588"\w*.
Blessed \w be|strong="H5769"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3556"\w* take \w and|strong="H3915"\w* dash thy little ones against \w the|strong="H0853"\w* rock.
